name: Live By Design
tag_list: social-network, wiki, design, designer, creative, architects, manufacturers, sellers, enthusiasts, products, materials, spaces
overview:
LiveByDesign is a social network platform for the design industry. It empowers users to take advantage of a valuable network of designers, manufacturers, sellers and design enthusiasts that are all connected by products, materials and spaces.

By leveraging these connections LIVEBYDESIGN promotes its users by marketing their designs to like minded people, and making available great tools to facilitate the creation of new products, while offering an infinite database of designs that will educate consumers by providing them with smart growing content of every possible design.

Our mission is to simplify sharing, to expand content and to find any possible connection of a product, space, or material with the universe, creating a place like no other, smarter and bigger through the power of the social network.
